entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 10:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

Temperature: 0.7°C

Visibility: 11 km
Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
